title: dEvadEvan pAdam
sahitya:
dEvadEvan pAdam paNivAi pErinbam aDaivAi manamE


anupallavi

  bhU ulagil mAndar azhagu nilaiyO yAvuminra
 Ishan mElE anbu koNDAl kurai varAdE


caraNam    mAniDa uDalE minnal pOlE maraivadAlE arivu koNDu mEnilai peravE 
jnAnigaL pOlE mAya inbam nIkki mOna nilaiyil inbam aDaivAi
